intimidating_shout.des: Unleash a terrifying roar, reducing damage to your foes by 20% for 5 sec.

fortify.des: Temporarily increases your armor by 25%, reducing damage dealt to you for 60 sec.

bash.des: Stuns opponent for 5 sec, and deals 10% damage.

hemorrhage.des: Tears open target dealing 5% damage initially, then deals up to 25 damage in 1 min.

stomp.des: Slams the ground, dealing 10 damage to nearby enemy units with a 20% chance to stun for 3 sec.

overpower.des: Strike at the opponent for 15% of damage. Cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.

frenzy.des: Increases attack speed by 50% and movement by 25%, but deals 5 damage every 5 sec to you. Lasts 120 sec.

searing_arrow.des: Shoot a flaming arrow at target that deals up to 25 damage in 75 sec.

concussive_shot.des: Hits the target for 10% damage, and dazes the target. Slowing movement and attack speed by 50% for 10 sec.

piercing_shot.des: A powerful shot at deals 10% damage that ignores target's armor.

stinging_shot.des: Fire a poison tipped arrow dealing 20% damage and 5 damage every 2 sec for 30 sec.

explosive_arrow.des: Fire a dynamite tipped arrow at target. When detonated, damages all units in blast radius by 10 damage

sniper_shot.des: Fires a well-aimed shot dealing 15% damage. Range of shot increased by 25%

explosive_trap.des: Plant an explosive trap, that'll explode when a unit passes near it. Arms itself in 5 sec, and self-destructs in 30 sec after.

volley.des: Rapidly launch 3 arrows at target dealing 5% damage each arrow.

fireball.des: Hurls a fiery ball that deals 5% of damage and 10 damage over 30 sec.

shadow_bolt.des: Sends a shadowy bolt at target, dealing 12% damage.

frost_bolt.des: Launches a bolt of frost at enemy. Deals 10% damage and slows target's movement by 30% for 10 sec.

siphon_mana.des: Drain up to 20% mana from enemy over 10 sec.

haste.des: Increase your movement speed by 50% for 10 sec.

slow.des: Slows target's movement and attack speed by 50% for 15 sec.

lightning_bolt.des: Hurl a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 12%, and then a 50% chance to jump to nearby enemies. Affects up to 3 units.

mind_blast.des: Blast the target's mind for 20% damage.

meteor.des: Rain down a meteror at target location, dealing 20% damage at target and 5% damage to units within the blast radius.
